title: Coconut plantation for sale near Hikkaduwa (2 Acres)
details: This unique two acre coconut plantation lays only 10 minutes away from the beautiful beaches of Hikkaduwa. Easy and quick access from the main coastal road connecting Colombo to Galle, the perfect stop off before reaching the bustly surf and sun destination that is Hikkaduwa. The driveway is sided by picturesque lagoons with the skyline dressed with mature coconut palms. Only 1 minute walk to the wide sandy deserted beach! The make up of the land is flat and would suit a number of commercial ventures such as villas, boutique hotel, and restaurant.
